name: Hotline in One
description:
Hotline in One is a combat mini golf game. You play as an 8 ball seeking revenge for previous pool related injuries. You must eliminate enemies and get to the hole in as few shots as possible.

Watch out! You won't die when getting shot, but it will count against par.

Can you stay under par on all the levels?

Controls:

  • Click and drag to aim and set power
  • R to restart level
